pricing.title: Special Price
pricing.description: All inclusive: Hotel, meals and training

activities.2pm: Analysis of each trade: what worked and what to improve

activities.830am: Supervised trading: you trade with mentor guidance

transformative.title: Transformative Experience
transformative.description: This isn't just a trading event, it's a complete experience designed to transform the way you trade the markets. During 3 intensive days, you'll have direct access to professional mentors who trade live with you.

benefits.operate: Trade in real time with expert supervision
benefits.network: Network with successful traders from the community

value.title: Added Value
value.description: Beyond the training, this event offers you a complete immersion experience in the world of professional trading, with all premium amenities and services included.

breakdown.title: All Inclusive for
breakdown.valued: Valued at over $2,000 if purchased separately

whyTampa.title: Why Tampa?
whyTampa.description: Tampa is the perfect destination for our exclusive event. With its perfect October weather, beautiful beaches, and professional atmosphere, it offers the ideal balance between intense work and relaxation moments.

weather.title: Perfect weather
weather.description: October in Tampa: 75-85°F, ideal for focus
